page.title: 10Change in Chalfont St.Peter.
page.content: I interviewed 20 people but only a few had been in Chalfont St.Peter for over 30 years.All said in the last 10 to 15 years the character of the village has changed.There has been a greater movement of people moving in and out due to job situations and family conditions. The village was tranquil with few roads and shops.There was more a feeling of togetherness amongst the people living then.They were all known to each other and all {festivals} and {functions} were attended by all. But due to modern circumstances,more people, cars, roads and companies the character has changed.There are new roads,{A413} where once stood fields, new roundabouts.there are new shops even supermarkets.The boom in {housing} estates means that more estate agents are cropping up.
